EmailTemplate.name: Square Import/Export Survey- 1221.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: We want your feedback on Square Inventory Sync
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We hope you are enjoying Square's import/export and inventory sync functionality. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for recently trying out BigCommerce’s integration with Square’s import/export and inventory sync functionality. To help us continue to improve our service, we’d like to ask you a few short questions about your experience. This survey should take less than 5 minutes to complete.
TAKE THE SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/QX8Y98J]]> Thanks,
The BigCommerce Team
